title: Dust Storms and Sandstorms
description: Sandstorm and dust storm events can pose a serious threat to human health and the health of the land. Rising global temperatures due to climate change have created a surge in the frequency and intensity of these powerful storms. Dust Storms and Sandstorms introduces students to the science behind these events and helps students understand the impact these storms can have throughout the world. This book can also be used to teach students how to identify cause-and-effect relationships as well as identify and use comparative adjectives.
meta: arid, asthma, encroaching, erosion, gusts, haboobs, hazardous, inhale, meteorologists, parched, respiratory, vulnerable
Cause and Effect : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
